Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Milestones.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Provides senior citizens shall be entitled to use any park, recreational facility or historic site without the imposition of any fee or other charge
Summary: Provides senior citizens shall be entitled to use any park, recreational facility or historic site without the imposition of any fee or other charge; defines senior citizens as persons 62 years of age or older.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to waiver of certain fees
